title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 508.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 508.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to any provider of services which has been approved or certified
pursuant to Part 551 of this Title to operate an assertive community treatment
(ACT) program. (b) This Part
applies to the operation of an ACT program by: (1)
a local governmental unit, general
hospital or voluntary agency; (2)
a
provider of services licensed pursuant to article 31 of the Mental Hygiene

Law; (3)
any part of a general
hospital as defined in article 28 of the Public Health Law which is licensed by
the office to provide mental health services; or
(4)
a State-operated psychiatric
center. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
508.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
